players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night, and he's a threat to us all. We need to work together to eliminate him."
Charlie: "I have no information to share at this time, but I agree with Alice that we must work together to ensure the safety of our town."

Charlie: "I have no new information to share, but I still believe that we need to work together as a team to ensure the safety of our town. Let's continue investigating and sharing information to uncover the truth behind the mysterious deaths in our town."
